_header: In book we find as we read / Of a priest was wild of deed
_description: ‘Of a prest þat lay by a noone’, a miracle of the Virgin Mary — thirty-nine couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IN Bok we fynde as we RedeOf a preest was wylde of
                    dede…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And þat hit mote so beSeyeþ to hire an
                    Aue
